meanings.definition: A person who participates in an exhibition or display of their work or skills.
meanings.sent1: The talented exhibitioner proudly showcased her paintings at the art gallery.
meanings.sent2: The science fair had many young exhibitioners presenting their innovative projects.
meanings.sent3: The exhibitioner's magic tricks were so good, they made the audience gasp in amazement.
meanings.sent4: As an exhibitioner of culinary delights, she turned ordinary ingredients into works of art.
meanings.sent5: The skilled exhibitioner's dance performance left a lasting impression on the audience.

meanings.definition: A student who has been awarded an exhibition (scholarship) at a university.
meanings.sent1: The bright exhibitioner received a scholarship for her exceptional academic achievements.
meanings.sent2: The university's top exhibitioners were honored at the annual awards ceremony.
meanings.sent3: The exhibitioner's scholarship allowed him to pursue his passion for history without financial worries.
meanings.sent4: She was like an exhibitioner of knowledge, sharing her insights with classmates eager to learn.
meanings.sent5: The dedicated exhibitioner spent long hours studying to maintain her scholarship.
